title: A ioyfull medytacyon to all Englonde of the coronacyon of our moost naturall souerayne lorde kynge Henry the eyght
author: Hawes, Stephen, d. 1523?
publisher: In the fletestrete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
